items.title: Register as a mentor in our inclusive program
items.description: Sign up to connect with veterans and military spouses from any training background who are seeking mentorship in your area of expertise.

items.title: Commit to our proven mentorship structure
items.description: Our data shows hands-on learners thrive with structure: mentors must provide at least two meetings weekly, with one dedicated to pair-programming for optimal knowledge transfer.

items.description: Our matching system connects you with veterans and military spouses who will benefit most from your specific knowledge and experience.
